Articles.Content: Hello. So, upon loading certain vessel, the kraken appeared, but only with a gentle caress. Now some parts (including the main engine) are missaligned. Is there a way to align them again? (Including save editing, is it dificult?)

Save editing is not TOO difficult, but ALWAYS GET A BACKUP.

So, AFTER BACKUPING, try to see if the engines are graphically misaligned or what.

Others have a better idea on editing savefiles, @Gargamel
As a practical matter, if you're actually going to edit the save, it's probably worth putting a "clean" version on the pad and copying the locations over.
Is this with a vehicle in flight? Try turning off all auto-struts, and then re-enabling them after the vehicle has settled down.
Quick save quick load. If it doesn't work, well you're kerbals have a useless ship.
